thread.title: Obama Awards Biden Presidential Medal Of Freedom
thread.title_full: Obama Awards Biden Presidential Medal Of Freedom

title: Obama Awards Biden Presidential Medal Of Freedom
text:
Obama Awards Biden Presidential Medal Of Freedom January 12, 2017 8:40 PM WASHINGTON, DC - JANUARY 12: (AFP OUT) U.S. President Barack Obama (R) presents the Medal of Freedom to Vice-President Joe Biden during an event in the State Dinning room of the White House, January 12, 2017 in Washington, DC. (Photo by Olivier Douliery-Pool/Getty Images) 
WASHINGTON (AP) – President Barack Obama is awarding Vice President Joe Biden the Presidential Medal of Freedom. 
A teary-eyed Biden accepted the medal, the highest civilian honor, at a ceremony at the White House Thursday. 
Obama says he is bestowing the honor on Biden for “faith in your fellow Americans, for your love of country and a lifetime of service that will endure through the generations.”
